meanings.sent1: The reopenings of the store brought back many customers.
meanings.sent2: The reopenings of schools after summer break are always exciting.
meanings.sent3: The reopenings of the ice cream shop made everyone scream for joy.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like it was experiencing multiple reopenings after seeing him again.
meanings.sent5: The reopenings of the curtains flooded the room with sunlight.

meanings.definition: The process of allowing something to be open again.
meanings.sent1: The reopenings of the gate were delayed due to maintenance.
meanings.sent2: The reopenings of the online registration portal were met with relief by the students.
meanings.sent3: The reopenings of the cookie jar were closely monitored by the kids.
meanings.sent4: The reopenings of old wounds can sometimes be painful.
meanings.sent5: The reopenings of the floodgates caused a rush of water into the valley.

meanings.sent1: The reopenings of the theme park signaled the start of the summer season.
meanings.sent2: The reopenings of the road closures eased the traffic congestion in the city.
meanings.sent3: The reopenings of the library doors were like a breath of fresh air for the students.
meanings.sent4: The reopenings of opportunities in life should be embraced with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent5: The reopenings of the flower buds in spring brought color back to the garden.
